name: Use TRUNCATE statement to clean a whole table (PeopleSoft)
description:
Use TRUNCATE statement to clean a whole table (instead of DELETE FROM table).
But beware no ROLLBACK is possible on a TRUNCATE TABLE statement.
rationale: Rules of construction of query to improve performances
remediation: Replace the DELETE FROM table by a TRUNCATE statement, in order  to clean a whole table.
alternativeName: Use TRUNCATE statement to clean a whole table (PeopleSoft)

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
